//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "bad_guy1", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "KAM12" );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );

	task ( "five" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/kam12/guard03/03openfire.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM12_005" );
	}

	dowait ( "five" );
}


affect ( "bad_guy2", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
}


affect ( "bad_guy3", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
}


affect ( "end_doctor", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_FORCE_SCRIPT", "ON" );
	wait ( 1200.000 );
	set ( "SET_MOOD", "Afraid" );
}
